paper_abstract: We show that every n-point metric of negative type (in particular, every n-point subset of L-1) admits a Frechet embedding into Euclidean space with distortion O(root log n center dot log log n), a result which is tight up to the O( log log n) factor, even for Euclidean metrics. This strengthens our recent work on the Euclidean distortion of metrics of negative into Euclidean space.
paper_title: Frechet embeddings of negative type metrics
